# markdown-it
markdown:
  preset: 'default'
  render:
    html: true
    xhtmlOut: false
    langPrefix: 'language-'
    breaks: true
    linkify: true
    typographer: true
    quotes: 'â€œâ€â€˜â€™'
  enable_rules:
  disable_rules:
  plugins:
    - '@renbaoshuo/markdown-it-katex'
  anchors:
    level: 2
    collisionSuffix: ''
    permalink: true
    permalinkClass: 'headerlink'
    permalinkSide: 'left'
    permalinkSymbol: ''
    case: 0
    separator: '-'
  images:
    lazyload: true
    prepend_root: false
    post_asset: false
  inline: false

# latex å…¬å¼æ”¯æŒ

katex:
  enable: false
  per_page: false # æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ¯é¡µéƒ½åŠ è½½ / Whether to load on each page
  copytex: false # æ˜¯å¦å¼€å¯å¤åˆ¶å…¬å¼ / Whether to enable copy formula
# æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ¯é¡µéƒ½åŠ è½½ / Whether to load on each page
# æ˜¯å¦å¼€å¯å¤åˆ¶å…¬å¼ / Whether to enable copy formula

# è¯„è®º
# comment
comment:
  enable: false
  type: # waline, twikoo
  commentBarrage: false # çƒ­è¯„å¼€å…³ / Hot comment switch
  newComment: false # æœ€æ–°è¯„è®ºå¼€å…³ / Latest comment switch
  # åŒ¿åè¯„è®ºå‰éƒ¨åˆ†éšæœºä¿¡æ¯ / Anonymous comment front random information
  randomInfoStart:

    - 'ç¾ä¸½çš„'
  # åŒ¿åè¯„è®ºåéƒ¨åˆ†éšæœºä¿¡æ¯ / Anonymous comment after random information
  randomInfoEnd:
    - 'ç™½èœ'
    - 'å°å¯çˆ±'
    - 'å°ä»™å¥³'
  # twikoo é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
  # twikoo settings
  twikoo: # https://twikoo.js.org/
    envId: # url: https://twikoo.sondy.top/
    lang: 'zh-CN' # è¯­è¨€
    accessToken: # accessToken
  # waline é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
  # waline settings

    envId: # url: https://waline.wzsco.top
    pageview: true # æ˜¯å¦å¼€å¯é¡µé¢è®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ / Whether to enable page access statistics
    option: # walineé…ç½®é¡¹ / waline configuration item
# åŒ¿åè¯„è®ºå‰éƒ¨åˆ†éšæœºä¿¡æ¯ / Anonymous comment front random information
# åŒ¿åè¯„è®ºåéƒ¨åˆ†éšæœºä¿¡æ¯ / Anonymous comment after random information
# æ˜¯å¦å¼€å¯é¡µé¢è®¿é—®é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ / Whether to enable page access statistics

# CDN
# Don't modify the following settings unless you know how they work
# éå¿…è¦è¯·ä¸è¦ä¿®æ”¹
CDN:
  # The CDN provider of internal scripts (ä¸»é¢˜å†… js çš„ cdn é…ç½®)
  # option: local/jsdelivr/unpkg/cdnjs/custom
  # Dev version can only choose. ( devç‰ˆæœ¬åªèƒ½ä¸º local )
  internal: local
  # The CDN provider of third party scripts (ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ js çš„ cdn é…ç½®)
  # option: jsdelivr/unpkg/cdnjs/custom
  third_party: custom

  # Add version number to url, true or false
  version: true

  # Custom format
  # For example: https://cdn.staticfile.org/${cdnjs_name}/${version}/${min_cdnjs_file}
  custom_format: https://cdn.staticfile.org/${cdnjs_name}/${version}/${min_cdnjs_file}

  option:

html .light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-light-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-light-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-light-text-decoration);}html.light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-light-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-light-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-light-text-decoration);}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
